review: It was very nice *** ****** *** ****** ********* and my teeth cleaning was done very smoothly and its very pocket friendly.

Had problems with the dental bridges. Consulted different doctors. But I was satisfied with doctor Abdul Haque Inamdar's explanation and confidence in treatment. I am very much satisfied and thankful that I landed in the hands of a very good professional doctor. The treatment and implantation of the teeth was not very painful due to his expertise. Waiting period is very short at the time of appointment. I would highly recommend him for the dental treatment and implantation of the teeth.
